trans-unit.source: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
To obtain an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary> object, call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleBinary%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pour obtenir un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary> de l’objet, appelez le <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleBinary%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: The byte array to be stored in the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value" /> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure, setting the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value" /> property to the contents of the supplied byte array.
The object to be compared to this <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> object to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.
A signed number indicating the relative values of this <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure and the object.
<list type="table"><listheader><term> Return Value
</term><description> Condition
</description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
</term><description> The value of this <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object is less than the object.
</description></item><item><term> Zero
</term><description> This <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object is the same as the object.
</description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
</term><description> This <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object is greater than the object.
-or-
The object is a null reference.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Concatenates two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to create a new <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure with the concatenated values of the <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" /> parameters.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if they are equal.
The object to be compared.
Compares the supplied object parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> and the two are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if they are equal.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structure.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if the first is greater than the second.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than the second instance, otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if the first is greater than or equal to the second.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance, otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structure is null.
<see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is null, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si <see langword="Value" /> est null, sinon <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The position of the byte to be retrieved.
Gets the single byte from the <see langword="Value" /> property located at the position indicated by the integer parameter, <paramref name="index" />.
If <paramref name="index" /> indicates a position beyond the end of the byte array, an exception is raised.
The byte located at the position indicated by the integer parameter.
trans-unit.target: L’octet situé à la position indiquée par le paramètre de type entier.

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising an `OracleNullValueException`, always check the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> property and the `Length` property before reading `this`.
trans-unit.target: Pour éviter le déclenchement d’un `OracleNullValueException`, vérifiez toujours la <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> propriété et la `Length` avant la lecture `this`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length in bytes of the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value" /> property.
This property is read-only.
The length of the binary data in the <see langword="Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: La longueur des données binaires dans le <see langword="Value" /> propriété.

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising an `OracleNullValueException`, always check the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the `Length` property.
trans-unit.target: Pour éviter le déclenchement d’un `OracleNullValueException`, vérifiez toujours la <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> avant la lecture du `Length` propriété.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if the first is less than the second.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than the second instance, otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if the first is less than or equal to the second.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance, otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if they are not equal.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value" /> property of an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structure.
`Null` functions as a constant for the `OracleBinary` structure.
trans-unit.target: `Null` fonctionne comme une constante pour le `OracleBinary` structure.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
Concatenates the two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> parameters to create a new <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
The concatenated values of the <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" /> parameters.
`x` will appear first in the resulting `OracleBinary`, followed by `y`.
trans-unit.target: `x` apparaît en premier dans la boîte `OracleBinary`, suivi par `y`.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic]
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic]

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, you can use the operators defined by a class, but you cannot override them or create your own.
trans-unit.target: En Visual Basic, vous pouvez utiliser les opérateurs définis par une classe, mais vous ne pouvez pas les remplacer ou créer votre propre.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Concat%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: La méthode équivalente pour cet opérateur est <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Concat%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if they are equal.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: La méthode équivalente pour cet opérateur est <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" />.
Gets the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> parameter as an array of bytes.
An array of bytes.
[Visual Basic]
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic]

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, you can use the conversions defined by the class, but you cannot override them or create your own.
trans-unit.target: En Visual Basic, vous pouvez utiliser les conversions définies par la classe, mais vous ne pouvez pas les remplacer ou créer votre propre.

trans-unit.source: If Option Strict is set, you must use the \<CType operator> to convert the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary> to a binary object.
trans-unit.target: Si Option Strict est défini, vous devez utiliser le \<opérateur CType > pour convertir le <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary> à un objet binaire.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: La méthode équivalente pour cet opérateur est <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if the first is greater than the second.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than the second instance, otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.GreaterThan%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: La méthode équivalente pour cet opérateur est <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.GreaterThan%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if the first is greater than or equal to the second.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance, otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.GreaterThanOrEqual%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: La méthode équivalente pour cet opérateur est <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.GreaterThanOrEqual%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to be converted.
Converts an array of bytes to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structure.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure that represents the converted array of bytes.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
An <see langword="OracleBinary" /> object.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structures to determine if they are equal.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <see langword="OracleBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see langword="OracleBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary" /> structure.
This property is read-only.
The value of the <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: La valeur de la <see langword="OracleBinary" /> structure.

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising an `OracleNullValueException`, always check the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the `Value` property.
trans-unit.target: Pour éviter le déclenchement d’un `OracleNullValueException`, vérifiez toujours la <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary.IsNull%2A> avant la lecture du `Value` propriété.
